skin.clickToApply: Click on any skin to apply it instantly
skin.notAvailableMessage: This skin is not available as a mod
skin.unavailableTooltip: This skin doesn't have a mod file available

status.gameNotFound: Game path not found. Please browse manually.

tools.description: The CS:LOL mod tools are required to apply skins. Would you like to download them now?

downloadAll.title: Download All Skins
downloadAll.optionsDescription: Choose which skins to download and configure download settings.
downloadAll.excludeChromasDesc: Skip chroma variants to reduce download size
downloadAll.excludeVariantsDesc: Skip prestige editions and special variants
downloadAll.excludeEsportsDesc: Skip championship and professional team skins
downloadAll.concurrencyDesc: Number of simultaneous downloads (higher = faster but more resource intensive)

leagueClient.title: League Client Integration
leagueClient.description: Enable features that connect with the League of Legends client

championDetection.title: Champion Detection
championDetection.description: Automatically show notifications when you select champions in League client

autoViewSkins.title: Auto View Skins
autoViewSkins.description: Automatically view skins when a champion is detected

smartApply.title: Smart Apply
smartApply.description: Only load skins for champions in your team (reduces loading time)

autoApply.title: Auto Apply
autoApply.description: Automatically apply skins when all champions are locked

autoApplyTriggerTime.title: Auto Apply Trigger Time
autoApplyTriggerTime.description: Seconds before game starts to automatically apply skins (5-30 seconds)

autoAccept.title: Auto Accept Match
autoAccept.description: Automatically accept ready check when a match is found

autoPick.title: Auto Pick
autoPick.description: Automatically pick champions during champion select
autoPick.forceDescription: Override team picks and pick even if already selected

autoBan.title: Auto Ban
autoBan.description: Automatically ban champions during champion select
autoBan.forceDescription: Override team intent and ban even if teammate wants to play

autoRandomSkin.title: Auto Random Skin
autoRandomSkin.description: Automatically select a random skin when a champion is detected

autoRandomRaritySkin.title: Auto Random Rarity Skin
autoRandomRaritySkin.description: Automatically select a random skin with rarity (Epic, Legendary, etc.) when a champion is detected

autoRandomFavoriteSkin.title: Auto Random Favorite Skin
autoRandomFavoriteSkin.description: Automatically select a random skin from your favorites when a champion is detected

autoRandomHighestWinRateSkin.title: Auto Random Highest Win Rate Skin
autoRandomHighestWinRateSkin.description: Automatically select a random skin from the top 3 highest win rate skins

autoRandomHighestPickRateSkin.title: Auto Random Highest Pick Rate Skin
autoRandomHighestPickRateSkin.description: Automatically select a random skin from the top 3 most popular skins

autoRandomMostPlayedSkin.title: Auto Random Most Played Skin
autoRandomMostPlayedSkin.description: Automatically select a random skin from the top 3 most played skins

inGameOverlay.title: In-Game Overlay
inGameOverlay.description: Pre-attach overlay to League client for faster skin notifications (requires any Auto Random feature)

allowMultipleSkinsPerChampion.title: Allow Multiple Skins per Champion
allowMultipleSkinsPerChampion.description: Enable to use multiple skins for the same champion simultaneously

autoFixModIssues.title: Auto-fix mod issues on import
autoFixModIssues.description: Automatically fix missing health bars, materials, and VFX when importing mods

modToolsTimeout.title: Mod Tools Timeout
modToolsTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for mod import and overlay creation operations
modToolsTimeout.hint: Increase this value if you have many mods or a slow system. Decrease for faster failure detection.

cacheManagement.title: Skin Cache Management
cacheManagement.description: Manage the cached skin files used for faster mod application
cacheManagement.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear the skin cache? This will force all skins to be re-imported on the next apply, which may take longer.

repositories.title: Skin Repositories
repositories.cannotRemoveActive: Cannot remove the active repository. Please set another repository as active first
repositories.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this repository?

statusHelp.valid: Repository structure verified - ready to use

addDialog.title: Add Custom Repository
addDialog.description: Add a GitHub repository containing League of Legends skins
addDialog.urlHint: Paste a GitHub URL and fields will be auto-filled
addDialog.name: Repository Name

cslol.title: CSLoL Tools
cslol.description: Manage the CSLoL tools used for applying skins
cslol.versionHint: Manually setting the version will override the current version info.

minimizeToTray.title: Minimize to Tray
minimizeToTray.description: Hide the app to system tray instead of closing when clicking the close button

autoExtractImages.title: Auto Extract Preview Images
autoExtractImages.description: Automatically extract preview images from WAD files when importing skins (requires conversion tools)

fileUpload.importDescription: Optionally select a champion and set a custom name for your mod.
fileUpload.author: Author
fileUpload.fixModIssuesDescription: Fixes missing health bars, materials, and VFX

importMethod.title: Import Custom Mod
importMethod.description: Choose how you want to import your custom mod
importMethod.invalidUrl: Invalid URL. Please provide a direct download link to a mod file
importMethod.directDownloadNote: Only direct download links are supported

editCustomSkin.title: Edit Custom Mod
editCustomSkin.fixDescription: Fixes missing health bars, materials, and VFX issues
editCustomSkin.fixError: An error occurred while fixing the mod
editCustomSkin.swapDescription: Replace the mod file while keeping all settings and metadata
editCustomSkin.modFileSwapped: Mod file has been replaced successfully
editCustomSkin.swapError: An error occurred while replacing the mod file

update.description: A new version of Bocchi is available for download.
update.championDataDescription: A new version of champion data is available. This update includes the latest champions, skins, and other game content.

skins.searchPlaceholder: Search by champion or skin name...

presets.title: Presets
presets.createFirst: Create your first preset by selecting skins and clicking 'Save as Preset'

saveDialog.title: Save Preset
saveDialog.description: Save {{count}} selected skins as a preset
saveDialog.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for this preset

presets.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete preset '{{name}}'?

room.description: Create a new room or join an existing one to share skins with others.

diagnostics.title: P2P Connection Diagnostics
diagnostics.relayHelp: Your connection is being relayed through a server. This may result in higher latency but ensures connectivity.
diagnostics.directHelp: You have a direct peer-to-peer connection. This provides the best performance.
diagnostics.waitingForPeers: Waiting for other members to join the room...
diagnostics.tip2: Ensure your network allows UDP traffic
diagnostics.tip3: Try restarting your router if connection issues persist
diagnostics.symmetricNatWarning: Your network uses Symmetric NAT which requires relay servers for connectivity

fileTransfer.description: A peer wants to share a custom mod with you

lcu.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to League Client
lcu.tooltipNotConnected: Start League of Legends client to enable automatic champion detection during champion select
lcu.tooltipConnected: Connected to League client. Will show notifications when you select champions
lcu.tooltipInChampSelect: Currently in champion select. Select a champion to see a notification
lcu.tooltipDisabled: Champion detection is disabled. Enable it in settings to receive notifications when selecting champions
lcu.championLockedDescription: You have locked in {{champion}}. Would you like to browse available skins?
lcu.championHoveredDescription: You are hovering {{champion}}. Would you like to browse available skins?

smartApply.noSkinsToApply: No skins to apply for your team
smartApply.noSkinsForTeam: No skins selected for your team champions

errors.operationTimeout: Operation timed out. Please try again.
errors.skinNotAvailable: The skin is either not available in lol-skins repository or the mapping is wrong

confirmations.confirmDeleteAll: Are you sure you want to delete all skins? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.confirmDeleteChampion: Are you sure you want to delete all skins for {{champion}}? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.confirmDeleteSkin: Are you sure you want to delete "{{skin}}"?

messages.noSkinsSelectedYet: No skins selected yet. Click on skins above to add them to your selection.
